titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: University of Delaware Special Collections Department Morris Library, 181 South College Avenue Newark, DE 19717-5267

bioghist.p: Ed Kee is a vegetable crop specialist for the University of Delaware Cooperative Extension Service. He is the author of Saving Our Harvest: The Story of the Mid-Atlantic Region's Canning and Freezing Industry. Kee also serves on the Delaware Heritage Commission, and the board of the Delaware Agriculture Museum. The Peninsula Horticultural Society, was established in 1886, to encourage horticulture in the Delmarva peninsula.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of materials related to the Peninsula Horticultural Society. Records include: meeting minutes (1956-1988); annual reports; correspondence; and photographs. The collection also includes copies of the Delmarva Vegetable Marketing Guide and the Fruit and Vegetable Forecast.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
